name: 'Toy Story 2' Minutiae, part 1 Multiple Choice Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which character is the first to appear in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Buzz Lightyear.

	Actually, it's Buzz's videogame persona being played by Rex. But we don't know this until after Rex loses.

questions.text: During the videogame sequence, Buzz jumps on five anti-grav platforms which play notes. What song are the notes from?
questions.correct: 'Thus Spake Zarathustra', theme from the movie '2001: A Space Odyssey'
options: 'Close Encounters of the Third Kind' theme
questions.explanation:
'Thus Spake Zarathustra', theme from the movie '2001: A Space Odyssey'.

	This is the same music that plays when the apes discover the first obilisk in the prehistoric past.

questions.text: What is Woody looking for at the beginning of the movie?
questions.explanation:
His hat.

	He just can't go to Cowboy Camp without his hat!

questions.text: Who finds the item that Woody's looking for at the beginning of the movie?
questions.explanation:
Slinky Dog.

	Mr. Potato Head said he found something, but it was his wife's earring (which was still attached to her ear).

questions.text: In the 5 minutes before Andy has to go to camp, he starts playing one of his fantasy games with all of the toys. Which toy plays the evil madman that is threatening Bo Peep's life?
questions.explanation:
Hamm.

	It's Hamm, wearing Mr. Potato Head's derby. Mr. Potato Head is the previous victim of the monkeys.

questions.text: What does the T-shirt that Andy is wearing just before he heads to camp say?
questions.explanation:
Triple-R Ranch.

	This was the name of the ranch from the 'Spin and Marty' serials on the original 'Mickey Mouse Club'.

questions.text: After Woody is left home because of his damaged arm, he has a dream that Andy has come home early. What is the first clue that this is a dream?
questions.correct: The playing cards that the other toys are playing with
options: The other toys are colored differently than in real life
questions.explanation:
The playing cards that the other toys are playing with.

	All the cards are Aces of Spades. This card is commonly called the death card, which is appropriate because Woody's dream is about Andy rejecting him and throwing him away because he's damaged.

Buster.

	'Pal' is Arthur's puppy in the PBS cartoon 'Arthur'.  'Spot' is Data's cat in 'Star Trek: The Next Generation'.  'Heimlich' is the caterpillar in 'A Bug's Life' and in a cameo appearance in TS2.

questions.text: What toy is the first to notice the yard sale Andy's mother is setting up?
questions.explanation:
Wheezy.

	Wheezy points it out to Woody as they're sitting on the top shelf. Woody then raises the alarm to the other toys.

questions.text: Andy's mom takes Wheezy down to the yard sale. How is the box which he is in marked when Woody goes down to rescue him?
